metadata.title: CVE-2015-3456 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.description:
The Floppy Disk Controller (FDC) in QEMU, as used in Xen 4.5.x and earlierand KVM, allows local guest users to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds write and guest crash) or possibly execute arbitrary codevia the (1) FD_CMD_READ_ID, (2) FD_CMD_DRIVE_SPECIFICATION_COMMAND, orother unspecified commands, aka VENOM.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3456` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

qemu - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-common - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-guest-agent - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-keymaps - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-kvm - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-system - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-system-aarch64 - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-system-arm - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-system-common - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-system-mips - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-system-misc - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-system-ppc - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-system-sparc - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-system-x86 - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-user - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-user-static - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
qemu-utils - 2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11
No subscription required

libxen-4.4 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6
libxen-ocaml - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6
libxenstore3.0 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6
xen-hypervisor-4.1-amd64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6
xen-hypervisor-4.3-amd64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6
xen-hypervisor-4.3-armhf - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6
xen-hypervisor-4.4-amd64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6
xen-hypervisor-4.4-arm64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6
xen-hypervisor-4.4-armhf - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6
xen-system-amd64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6
xen-system-arm64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6
xen-system-armhf - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6
xen-utils-4.4 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6
xen-utils-common - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6

No subscription required

virtualbox - 4.3.10-dfsg-1ubuntu5
virtualbox-dkms - 4.3.10-dfsg-1ubuntu5
virtualbox-guest-dkms - 4.3.10-dfsg-1ubuntu5
virtualbox-guest-source - 4.3.10-dfsg-1ubuntu5

virtualbox-qt - 4.3.10-dfsg-1ubuntu5

criterions.comment: qemu package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.0+dfsg-2ubuntu1.11').
xen package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.6').
virtualbox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.10-dfsg-1ubuntu5').
